topic.question: How do you feel about being left out?

submission.answer: I'm left out all the time when I hang around with the popular people, but now, I'm kinda used to it.
submission.name: Anonymous

submission.answer: I HATE being left out. I think everyone does. Plus, it's not right and just WRONG!
submission.name: Bubbles

submission.answer: i dont like being letf out i fell like a piece of a puzzle lost
submission.name: Anonymous

topic.question: ¿Cuál ha sido la fiesta de cumpleaños más sorprendente que jamás hayas tenido?

submission.answer: QUE E TENIDO REGALOS Y TARTA
submission.name: Maria

submission.answer: me isieron una fiesta de prinsesa alos 4 aaños
submission.name: Aylin

submission.answer: Fue cuando cumpli 5 años y de sorpresa fue barney y isimoos muchos juegos
submission.name: Arlene

submission.answer: My sister and I slept in the same room together. She always puts her stuff near my bed. So I decided to measure my room in pillows. My room turned out to be about 6 pillows wide. So my sister and I each got a space about 3 pillows wide to put all our stuff in. My sister never did put all her stuff on my side of the room again.
submission.name: Justin

submission.answer: I have seven pencils. If I took one pencil the fraction will be:1/7.
submission.name: Katherine

submission.answer: I tried it on my mom. I changed the trick a little, though. Here are the steps: Original My way Pick a number Pick a number double it add 12 add 12 subtract 6 divide by 2 subtract number subtract number DONE! DONE!
submission.name: Noah
